skins.selfIntroduction: I am the second ship of the K?nigsberg-class light cruisers, Karlsruhe! I participated in battles as the flagship of an Iron Blood torpedo squadron. I hate cold weather, storms, and that pesky Truant...
skins.acquisition: Hi, it's me, Karlsruhe! Please take good care of me, Commander.
skins.login: Ehehe... I have a feeling something good will happen today!
skins.details: Ahaha~ Are you that interested in me, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: La~ la~ la~ When is the next battle?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is.. is there a storm coming?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Boring~ boring! How do you expect me to stay quiet?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Nya? Why do I feel so hot where you touched me...?

skins.acquisition: Commander, take a look at my new rigging! Doesn't it look all shiny and strong? Now, I feel like I can weather any storm... probably!
skins.login: Commander, let's put our best foot forward and work hard today!
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'll give any storm a good thrashing! Hyaah!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, are you interested in me? Ehehe, us K?nigsberg sisters are famous for our good looks~!
skins.secretaryTouch: Did you call? If you want to play, I'm down any time!
